channel.title: Coverage on DevOps Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Coverage on DevOps Engineer

item.title: How to fix "hidden symbol `__gcov_init' in ../libgcov.a(_gcov.o) is referenced by DSO"
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article explains how to resolve the “hidden symbol `__gcov_init’ in ../libgcov.a(_gcov.o) is referenced by DSO” error when building a project with Gcov, including how to ensure symbols are not hidden.

item.title: A Code Coverage Tool - Squish Coco use examples
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: introduction to Squish Coco, a code coverage tool, with examples of how to set it up and use it in Visual Studio for C++ projects.

item.title: Code Coverage tools of C/C++
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: Code Coverage is a measurement of how many lines, statements, or blocks of your code are tested using your suite of automated tests. It’s an essential metric to understand the quality of your QA efforts.
